General.Name: Guangzhou Guangri Stock Co Ltd
General.Description: Guangzhou Guangri Stock Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells elevators and related parts in China. It engages in the design, production, installation, repair, and maintenance of elevators, escalators, moving walks, and intelligent mechanical parking equipment, and platform screen door equipment; design and production of elevator electrical components and related electrical products, elevator guide rails, and related spare parts; and provides logistics services, including transportation services, distribution and warehousing services, packaging services, circulation processing, etc.; and resistance welding machine, automatic arc welding machine, robot systems, laser welding systems, automated welding production line integration, etc. It serves rail transit, automobiles, hardware appliances, precision sheet metal, aerospace, and other industrial fields. The company was formerly known as Guangzhou Iron and Steel Co.,Ltd. The company is based in Guangzhou, China. Guangzhou Guangri Stock Co.,Ltd. operates as a subsidiary of Guangzhou Intelligent Equipment Group Co.,Ltd.
General.Address: No.636, Guomao Avenue South, Guangzhou, China, 511447
